titleStmt.title: Room for miracles;, or, Miracles from Room a cart-load for a penny. : Pleasantly yet truely exposing the wonderful fopperies imposed by the popish church, to be believed by her Catholick children. : To which is added a lump of holy reliques, worth no body knows what, as a cast into the bargain.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles, California.
